## Expected value of a function of a continuous RV

::: columns
::: {.column width="40%"}
**How do we calculate expected values of discrete RVs?**

 
 
 
 

For discrete RVs: weight average
$$\mathbb{E}[X] = \sum_{i=1}^n x_ip_X(x_i).$$
